details:
noun
- any clever maneuver
= synonyms: device
- something unspecified whose name is either forgotten or not known
= synonyms: gizmo, gismo, widget, doodad, doohickey, doojigger, gubbins, thingamabob, thingumabob, thingmabob, thingamajig, thingumajig, thingmajig, thingummy, whatchamacallit, whatchamacallum, whatsis
- a drawback or difficulty that is not readily evident
= synonyms: catch
